data.meta_description:

My first introduction to the X-MEN was when they were featured in episodes of ‚ÄúSpider-Man and his Amazing Friends‚Äù in the early 80‚Äôs. Anybody remember Wolverine‚Äôs Australian accent way back then? üòÇ In July of 1989 I was a 7th grader about to go into 8th, and that‚Äôs when I bought my very first comicbook: The Uncanny X-MEN 246 written by Chris Claremont and illustrated by @marc_silvestri. 
I am SO excited to watch this new animated series (based on the ‚Äò92-‚Äò97 series) and NERD out with my kids. And I cannot wait to see what the the MCU has planned for these characters that I have loved at such an early age.
